text: Mir Hazar Khan Bijarani (Urdu: میرہزار خان بجارانی) (10 July 1946 – 1 February 2018) was a Pakistani politician. He served as a Member of the Provincial Assembly of Sindh from June 2013 to February 2018 and before served from 1974 to 1977. He was also a member of the National Assembly of Pakistan from 1990 to 1993 and again from 1997 to 2013. He was born in Karampur, Kashmore District. Bijarani was found dead in his home in Karachi on 1 February 2018 along with his second wife Fariha Razzaq Haroon. Police say that Bijarani shot and killed his wife and committed suicide afterwards. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Suicides by firearm Category:Politicians who committed suicide Category:Murderers who committed suicide Category:Pakistani criminals Category:Politicians from Sindh
title: Hazar Khan Bijarani
